name: Acid Shells
pages: Blast radius: 5.0$(br)Base damage: 50.0$(br2)$(#39e622)$(l)Acid$() shells douse targets with a highly corrosive chemical. These shells specialize against highly armored or higher health targets.

pages.title: Corroding
pages.text: Acid grenades impart the Corroding III effect on targets, reducing their armor and armor toughness by 99.99% for the duration of the effect.
